name: Killer Rabbit
strategy: Killer Rabbits have weak armour and have no resistances and weaknesses, so you can use any weapon/runes you want. It is wise to kill it fast and to use area of effect spells/runes like [[Berserk]], [[Great Fireball]], [[Avalanche]] or [[Divine Caldera]] if it summons its own copies. This monster can only be found on the [[Isle of Evil]] along with other evil creatures.
